[Home](./index.md) &gt; [state-management](./state-management.md) &gt; [StoreSettings](./state-management.storesettings.md)

## StoreSettings interface

Represents an object with store configurations. Provided with token [STORE\_SETTINGS](./state-management.store_settings.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StoreSettings 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [logStateChanges?](./state-management.storesettings.logstatechanges.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if state changes should be logged to console for debugging purposes. WARNING! Should be set to false in production builds! |
|  [strictImmutability?](./state-management.storesettings.strictimmutability.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to freeze all actions and state. Helps with debugging the immutability of the system. WARNING! Should be set to false in production builds! |
